name: Space (FigyTuna)
description:
Controls: Use the mouse (left click) to push your character around in space. Use the compass to see which direction you are pushing in (optional).

Goal: Collect all 6 tokens while avoiding things that will bump you around.

This game was made when I had just started learning to code, many years before it was posted here.

It's written in Javascript using pixi.js.

Source Code on GitHub

License: MIT
